channel.title: [Quest] Fishing Contest for DarkQuest
channel.description:
;D [IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1814/fc001.png[/img]
around 90% replicated
Npc id - spawn location (x y) 345 - 560 486 Grandpa Jack 346 - 569 490 Vlad 347 - 566 492 Bonzo 349 - 563 492 Morris 355 - 428 455 Mountain dwarf !start quest
An easy way to spawn them is using the ::teleport command and then ::npc
garlic 218 (just in case you don't know were to get it :P)

item.title: [Quest] Fishing Contest for DarkQuest
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“latifundio, post:3, topic:425249”][quote author=nacional link=topic=527912.msg3848920#msg3848920 date=1323848673]
cool stuff but wouldn’t it better if you develop this for the moparsc source?
[/quote]
They will change the way plugin works or at least that’s what I read, anyway I don’t think it is too hard to port it over(maybe even fixing things I missed out).

Another thing is that will not be adding p2p stuff until they finish f2p or something like that.[/quote]You can add the P2P stuff, it just won’t be used in the official MoparRSC when it’s put online in F2P mode.

Read full topic
